}} 'Control' is the third full-length album by Pedro the Lion. It was released
on April 16, 2002 on Jade Tree Records. It is a concept album about a business
man who is having an affair on his wife, who kills him. It covers such subject
matter as infidelity, parenthood, greed, vengeance, and fear of death.
